title: Cosmopolitan Cardiff Escape with Rooftop Steakhouse & Terrace
description: Immerse yourself in Wales' buzzing capital when you stay at Hotel Indigo Cardiff, an IHG Hotel, a sophisticated designer escape just a five-minute walk to Cardiff Castle. Spend days exploring the city: catch a rugby match with the locals at Cardiff Arms Park, listen to local music at the Motorpoint Arena, or peruse tasty treats at Cardiff Market. For dinner, head to the hotel's rooftop for cocktails and succulent steaks at Marco Pierre White Steakhouse & Bar, the ideal way to cap off your day.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Cardiff, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Dominions Arcade, Queen St, Cardiff CF10 2AR, United Kingdom

title: Cardiff Five-Star Waterfront Retreat with Luxury Award-Winning Spa
description: Marvel at the eclectic building design of the five-star voco™  St. David's Cardiff, an IHG Hotel, and take in exceptional views over the tranquil Cardiff Bay. World-class international cuisine meets Welsh heritage at the hotel's chic restaurant and bar, and award-winning spa treatments await at The Spa at St David's, along with relaxing hydro and swimming pools. Venture out of the hotel to stroll around the nearby docks or explore the attractions of vibrant Cardiff.
location_description: voco St David's Cardiff, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Havannah Street, Cardiff CF10 5SD, Cardiff, United Kingdom

title: Stylish Cardiff Bay Waterside Escape with Breakfast Cafe & Lobby Lounge
description: Overlook the shimmering waters of Cardiff Bay with a bright and comfortable stay at the Holiday Inn Express Cardiff Bay, an IHG Hotel. Modern and vibrant, this waterside property offers guests a convenient launchpad into the nearby city centre, around the bay and beyond. Before setting off for the day, indulge in a spot of nourishing breakfast at the hotel’s Express Cafe, and return home as the sun begins to set for a relaxed drink at the hotel bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Cardiff Bay, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Longueil Close, Schooner Way, Cardiff CF10 4EE, United Kingdom
